title: Finnish Athletics Federation
text:
Finnish Athletics Federation (, abbr. SUL; ) is the governing body of <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> in <a href="Finland">Finland</a>. It was separated from the <a href="Finnish%20Gymnastics%20and%20Sports%20Federation">Finnish Gymnastics and Sports Federation</a> in 1932.
Today SUL has 850 member clubs and some 30 000 athletes. It is a member of <a href="Finnish%20Sports%20Federation">Finnish Sports Federation</a> which is the main governing body of <a href="Sport%20in%20Finland">Sport in Finland</a>.
